name: Maybe Today (EnjoyWorld)
description:
Genre -
Point and click quest where you play as a child with only one mission - escape

Story -
You play as an abused child, everyday is the same, you want to run away from this horror. Mom left and dad fall asleep, so maybe today you can run?

Restrictions -

Game is not suitable for children! Contents scary images and dark atmosphere

How long is the game? -

The game can be completed in under 5 - 10 minutes

Game was created with -

Programmer - https://nathalie-hogenberg.itch.io
